20101217143509.571|20101217143511.000|CCO|THE TEA PARTY MOVEMENT IS 
20101217143511.000|20101217143513.500|CCO|CLAIMING VICTORY FOR THIS -- FOR
20101217143513.500|20101217143516.000|CCO|HARRY REID NOT HAVING THE VOTES.
20101217143516.000|20101217143518.500|CCO|>> SHANNON, WHAT HAPPENS NOW?
20101217143518.500|20101217143521.000|CCO|TECHNICALLY WE'RE OUT OF MONEY 
20101217143521.000|20101217143522.429|CCO|TO PAY THE BILLS BY THIS WEEKEND
20101217143522.429|20101217143523.857|CCO|AND THE SENATE PASSING A STOP 
20101217143523.857|20101217143525.286|CCO|GAP MEASURE I GUESS. 
20101217143525.286|20101217143526.714|CCO|>> THAT'S RIGHT. 
20101217143526.714|20101217143528.143|CCO|>> WHEN THE SPENDING BILL COMES 
20101217143528.143|20101217143529.571|CCO|BACK AGAIN, WILL IT BE STRIPPED 
20101217143529.571|20101217143531.000|CCO|OF ALL THE EARMARKS?
20101217143531.000|20101217143533.000|CCO|>> REMAINS TO BE SEEN.
20101217143533.000|20101217143535.000|CCO|AS YOU JUST SAID, THERE'S A STOP

20101217144458.667|20101217144500.333|CCO|LOVE HIM AND THE MAN THAT YOU
